mean_en: (often in compounds) a container made of paper or plastic, that opens at the top, used especially in shops/stores; a strong container made from cloth, plastic, leather, etc., usually with one or two handles, used to carry things in when shopping or travelling
sentence: This white bag is so big! You can put so much in it.
sentence_trans: 这个白色的包真大！你可以放很多东西进去。
